abstract: The deal represents the latest move in G.E.’s effort to retreat from banking and refocus on its industrial roots.
snippet: The deal represents the latest move in G.E.’s effort to retreat from banking and refocus on its industrial roots.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — General Electric said on Thursday that it had signed a memorandum of understanding to sell its equipment finance and receivable finance businesses in France and Germany to Banque Fédérative du Crédit Mutuel, a unit of Crédit Mutuel of France.

headline.main: General Electric to Sell Units to Crédit Mutuel of France
